title: Masayuki Mita
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Mita was born in <a href="Miyagi%20Prefecture">Miyagi Prefecture</a> on October 5, 1969. After graduating from <a href="Osaka%20University%20of%20Commerce">Osaka University of Commerce</a>, he joined <a href="Gamba%20Osaka">Gamba Osaka</a> in 1992. Although he debuted and played 10 matches as midfielder in 1994 season, he could not play many matches. In 1996, he moved to his local club <a href="Sony%20Sendai%20FC">Sony Sendai</a> in <a href="Japanese%20Regional%20Leagues">Regional Leagues</a>. In 1998, the club was promoted to <a href="Japan%20Football%20League%20%281992%E2%80%9398%29">Japan Football League</a>. He retired end of 2001 season.
